medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The RLQ pain started at 1000 and has persisted, progressively worsening over this time frame. The patient had a history of similar pain (RUQ/epigastric pain) correlating to gallstones three days prior. She has had 2 episodes of non-bilious non-bloody emesis. Currently, she denies any fevers, chills, chest pain, or shortness of breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GERD, hip dysplasia, migraines; right hip fixation, labral tear right shoulder
